description:
Head of the Ome Foundation, a private company of mercenaries that conspires with Doba Ajiba to overthrow the Buff Clan emperor. After his underlings fail to defeat or capture the Ideon, Gindoro teams up with Doba on the Buff Clan flagship Bairal Jin. He was instrumental in the creation of the Gando Rowa, the Buff Clan`s most powerful weapon.

Following the death of Emperor Zuou he remains with Doba, not aware that the Buff Clan homeworld was destroyed as well. As the fighting escalates Gindoro desires to flee causing conflict with Doba, who shoots him. His spirit talks to Doba shortly following his death.
name: Gindoro Jinmu
